sentence.Network_en: They plotted to make the whole Mississippi Valley secede from the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们阴谋策划使整个密西西比流域脱离美国.

sentence.Network_en: We won't allow Tibet to secede from China and become an independent nation.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们决不允许西藏脱离中国独立.

sentence.Network_cn: 1990年的今天,斯洛文尼亚共和国投票决定脱离南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国.

as time goes by , Arafat , who is advanced in years , will secede from political arena sooner or later . however , the course of Palestinian people's liberation will not come to an end .随着时间的推移，年事已高的阿拉法特或迟或早要退出政治舞台，但巴勒斯坦人民的解放事业不会因此终结。
什么意思_英语secede在线翻译... ... secede from 脱离 right to secede 退出权 Provoke Request To Secede 一怒之下请求退党.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin secedere, from se- 'apart' + cedere 'go'

entry.tran: (从国家、大集团中正式)退出，脱离，分离
entry.def: If a region or group secedes from the country or larger group to which it belongs, it formally becomes a separate country or stops being a member of the larger group.

example.ex: Singapore seceded from the Federation of Malaysia and became an independent sovereign state...
example.tran: 新加坡脱离马来西亚联邦成为一个独立的主权国家。
塞内加尔于 1960年 8 月 20 日独立出去。

means.word_mean: 1. withdraw from an organization or communion;

sentences.sentence: "After the break up of the Soviet Union, many republics broke away"

stems_affixes.word_buile: se分开,离开,区别开+clus关闭+ive……的→喜欢把自己关起来→隐居的
sed=se分开,离开,区别开+it走+ion表名词→分开走→煽动叛乱
se分开,离开,区别开+ced走+e→走开→退出
se分开,离开,区别开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的
se分开,离开,区别开+cret区别+e→分辨开→分泌;藏起来
se分开,离开,区别开+duce引→引开→勾引别人
se分开,离开,区别开+greg群+ate表动词→和人群分开→隔离
se分开,离开,区别开+lect选→选出分开
se分开,离开,区别开+ver分开→分离开→切断
antecede[v.先行,先于]+ent……的→adj.先行的;以前的
un无+precedent[n.先例;惯例]+ed……的→无先例的
precede[v.在先,优于]+ent→预先走的东西→先例
pro在前+ced行走,前进+ure表名词→在前面走完的程序
ac+ced行走,前进+e→和别人走在一起→答应
ante前+ced行走,前进+e→走在前面→先行

re后+ced行走,前进+e→向后走→撤退
retro向后+ced走+e→往后走→把……归还
se分开+ced行走,前进+e→分开走→脱离
